modName: Imperator Furiosa - All perks and spells - Everything at 1000
summary: Every skill at 100, every perk selected, every spells, enchantments, ingredient uses, health, stamina and Magicka at 1000.
descriptionHtml:
This is a save game based on Imperator Furiosa, from Mad Max - Fury Road. She has every skill at level 100, every perk selected, and Magicka, health and stamina at 1000. That's why she has a lot of perks still available. I had to get to level 271.
<br /><br />She has no quests done, and only has that Boethiah miscellaneous quest because when I got to the Standing Stones there was a guy there. She's stopped at the Standing Stones, no stone selected.
<br /><br />The screenshots were done using mods, but I turned off every mod to save the game.
<br /><br />She has every spell, from every expansion(I'm as old as The Sims, so I refuse to call it DLC), but I think there won't be any problem if you don't have any.
<br /><br />I didn't got every shout because it started to get bugged when I used console commands to get them. So consider getting all of them a... challenge.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />I've used the following mods and stuff to develop every skill and get everything:
<br /><br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50371 - Know-it-all Trainers: I went to the "qasmoke" room, summonned Vilkas and developed every skill. By the Nine, it took some time.
<br /><br />-Opened every spell tome chests and read all of them
<br /><br />-Got the Alchemy perks to learn every function of the ingredients I eat and ate all of them. Almost died and got some diarrhoea but, as a Brazilian superstar says, "já diz aquele ditado, vamos fazer o quê?"(it's what that saying talks about, what can we do?)
<br /><br />-Got every Talos damn enchanted armor and weapon and clothes and circlet and everything and disenchanted them, learning everything
<br /><br />-Used the Skyrim Creation Kit to change the price of the Gold Diamond Necklace from 1200 to 30000000 and did a lot of them, increasing from level 15 to level 100 in the blink of an eye, and raised from level 81 to level 271, getting every perk I needed and increasing Magicka, health and stamina to 1000. I didn't tried it, but I think you can non-stop run from Riften to Markarth. Run, Furiosa, Run!
<br /><br />
<br /><br />So, that's what I've done. I'm thinking of putting the Gold Diamond necklace here too. Maybe in a few days I will. Have a nice overpowered game! And good luck trying to defeat the Ebony Warrior, because I died around 30 times trying, with 2 Atronachs by my side! He's overpowered too, and waitng for you in Whiterun...
author: Icaro Schuwartz
